https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gXP4dBib9fuWZjaR8OJRTqg9zlz.jpg Mehrdad Mehdi, one of the pioneers of street music in Iran, decides to gather his previous band again in order to run a street music festival in Tehran.Yet there are lots of obstacles and difficulties he has to face on this pathway. A Waltz for Tehran
